get.summary: GetAdminAudit returns audit events (admin only).
ListGovernanceCosts lists cost snapshots (admin only).

post.summary: IngestGovernanceCosts ingests cost snapshots (admin only).

get.summary: ListGovernanceResources lists tracked resources (admin only).

post.summary: IngestGovernanceResources ingests resource inventory (admin only).

get.summary: GetGovernanceSummary returns governance summary metrics (admin only).

post.summary: SyncGovernanceSources refreshes inventory from known sources (admin only).

get.summary: ListGovernanceUsage lists usage snapshots (admin only).

post.summary: IngestGovernanceUsage ingests usage snapshots (admin only).

get.summary: GetAdminImpersonateStatus returns current impersonation status (admin only).

get.description: Data is a short-lived snapshot stored in Redis by Telegraf.
get.summary: ListNodeMetrics returns a lightweight, live view of node metrics (admin only).

post.summary: SyncWorkspaces syncs all workspaces from external systems (admin only).

get.summary: ListAwsSSOAccounts returns accounts available for the current SSO session.
ListAwsSSORoles returns roles for a selected AWS account.
GetAwsSSOConfig returns the configured AWS SSO start URL and region.

post.summary: LogoutAwsSSO clears any stored AWS SSO tokens.
PollAwsSSO polls for device authorization completion.
StartAwsSSO begins the AWS device authorization flow.

get.summary: GetAwsSSOStatus returns connection status for the authenticated user.
AzurePortalRedirect opens the Azure portal with a login hint.

post.summary: ValidateAwsSSO checks that AWS SSO credentials can mint role credentials.

ListAzureSubscriptions returns available subscriptions for the provided service
principal.
ValidateAzureSP verifies Azure service principal credentials.
ListGCPProjects returns accessible projects for the provided service account.
ValidateGCPServiceAccount verifies GCP service account JSON by minting a token.

post.description: This enables "SSO" without needing to store or reuse the user's password.
post.summary:
DNSBootstrap provisions a per-user Technitium account + zone and stores a
long-lived API token in Skyforge.

get.description:
NOTE: Technitium uses localStorage tokens (not cookies). This endpoint serves a tiny HTML page that:

 1. fetches a token from Skyforge Server
 2. stores it in localStorage
 3. redirects to /dns/
get.summary:
DNSSSO bridges Skyforge auth into Technitium DNS by storing a minted token in
localStorage and redirecting.

get.description: The token is stored client-side (localStorage) by the DNS SSO bridge.
get.summary: DNSToken mints a Technitium session token for the current Skyforge user session.
ListEveServers returns configured EVE-NG servers.

get.description: and redirects to the proxied /labs/\<server>/ path.
get.summary: EveSSO logs into the selected EVE-NG server using the cached LDAP password
GetEveStats returns basic EVE-NG server stats for the status dashboard.
GCPConsoleRedirect opens the GCP console with a login hint.
GiteaPublicSSO logs into Gitea with a read-only public account.
GetAPIHealth returns a summary of database and redis health.
GetEveHealth checks configured EVE-NG endpoints.
GetLDAPHealth checks LDAP connectivity.
ExportWorkspaces returns workspace and user state for internal tooling.
GetLabsRunning returns running labs across providers (public).
GetLabsForUser returns labs scoped to the authenticated user.
GetNetlabDefaults returns the current netlab defaults from a runner.
ListNetlabLabs returns Netlab labs metadata.
GetNetlabLab returns metadata for a specific Netlab lab.
GetNetlabRuns returns recent Netlab runs for a workspace.
ListNetlabServers returns configured Netlab runners.
OIDCCallback finishes the OIDC flow and issues the Skyforge session cookie.
OIDCLogin starts the Dex OIDC auth flow and stores state/nonce cookies.
ListPKICerts lists issued certificates for the current user.
DownloadPKICert returns the certificate + key bundle for a specific cert.

post.summary: RevokePKICert marks a certificate revoked.
IssuePKICert issues a TLS certificate signed by the Skyforge CA.

get.summary: GetPKIRoot returns the root CA certificate.
ListPKISSHCerts lists issued SSH certificates for the current user.
DownloadPKISSHCert returns the SSH certificate + key bundle for a specific cert.

post.summary: RevokePKISSHCert marks an SSH certificate revoked.
IssuePKISSHCert issues an SSH user certificate signed by the Skyforge SSH CA.

get.summary: GetPKISSHRoot returns the SSH CA public key.
PublicConfig exposes non-sensitive public UI configuration.

get.description: back to the Skyforge login page, preserving the requested next hop.
get.summary:
Reauth clears the current session cookie (and any cached LDAP password) and
redirects
GetRuns returns recent runs from native Skyforge tasks.

post.summary: CreateRun is a reserved endpoint for admin-triggered native tasks.

get.summary: GetRunOutput returns output for a specific native task.
SessionTraefik is a Skyforge SSO gate compatible endpoint.

head.summary: SessionTraefikHead is a Skyforge SSO gate compatible endpoint (HEAD).

get.summary:
OIDCCallbackAlias provides backward-compatible routing for legacy OIDC callback
URLs.
OIDCLoginAlias provides backward-compatible routing for legacy OIDC login URLs.
ListSnmpTrapEvents returns the current user's trap inbox.

GetSnmpTrapToken returns the per-user SNMPv2c community string used for trap
routing.

post.summary: RotateSnmpTrapToken rotates the per-user community string.

get.description: By default it returns only events mapped to the current user via \`sf\_syslog\_routes\`. Admins can request unassigned events to help claim sources.
get.summary: ListSyslogEvents returns the syslog inbox for the current user.

delete.summary: DeleteSyslogRoute deletes a syslog route (admin only).

get.summary: ListSyslogRoutes lists configured source->user mappings (admin only).

put.summary: UpsertSyslogRoute creates/updates a syslog route (admin only).

get.summary: GetTemplates returns available templates for a workspace.
GetToolServicesStatus returns start/stop state for personal toolchain services.

post.summary: SetToolServiceReplicas sets the replica count for a personal toolchain service.

get.summary: GetUIConfig returns UI configuration values.
ListWebhookEvents returns the current user's webhook inbox.
GetWebhookToken returns the per-user webhook ingest token.

post.summary:
RotateWebhookToken rotates the per-user webhook ingest token (invalidates the
old one).

get.summary: GetWorkspaces returns workspaces visible to the authenticated user.

post.summary: CreateWorkspace provisions a new Skyforge workspace.

delete.summary: DeleteWorkspace deletes a workspace and its backing resources.

get.summary: ListWorkspaceArtifacts lists artifact objects for a workspace.

DownloadWorkspaceArtifact returns a presigned download redirect for the
artifact.

post.summary:
UploadWorkspaceArtifact uploads or presigns an artifact to the workspace's
bucket.

put.summary: PutWorkspaceAWSSSOConfig stores the AWS SSO account/role for the workspace.

get.summary: GetWorkspaceAWSStatic returns AWS static credential status.
GetWorkspaceAzureCredentials returns Azure service principal status.

put.summary: PutWorkspaceAzureCredentials stores Azure service principal credentials.

get.summary: GetWorkspaceGCPCredentials returns GCP service account status.

put.summary: PutWorkspaceGCPCredentials stores GCP service account JSON.

get.summary: GetWorkspaceContainerlabTemplates lists Containerlab templates for a workspace.
ListWorkspaceDeployments lists deployment definitions for a workspace.

post.summary: CreateWorkspaceDeployment creates a deployment definition for a workspace.

delete.summary: DeleteWorkspaceDeployment removes a deployment definition from Skyforge.

put.summary: UpdateWorkspaceDeployment updates an existing deployment definition.

post.summary:
RunWorkspaceDeploymentAction runs a deployment operation with consistent UX
verbs.

DestroyWorkspaceDeployment triggers a destructive run (destroy) for a
deployment.

SyncWorkspaceDeploymentForward triggers a Forward Networks sync for a
deployment.

get.description: For Netlab deployments, this executes \`netlab status\` against the associated Netlab API and returns the output.
get.summary: GetWorkspaceDeploymentInfo returns provider-specific info for a deployment.

GetWorkspaceDeploymentNetlabGraph returns a rendered netlab topology graph for a
deployment.

post.summary: StartWorkspaceDeployment starts a deployment run.

StopWorkspaceDeployment attempts to stop the most recent task for this
deployment.

get.summary: GetWorkspaceEve returns the workspace's EVE server selection.

put.summary: UpdateWorkspaceEve updates the workspace's EVE server selection.

get.summary: GetWorkspaceEveLab returns EVE lab state for the workspace.

post.summary: CreateWorkspaceEveLab creates an EVE lab for the workspace.

delete.summary:
DeleteWorkspaceForwardConfig removes Forward Networks credentials for a
workspace.

get.summary: GetWorkspaceForwardConfig returns Forward Networks credentials for a workspace.

post.summary:
PostWorkspaceForwardConfig stores Forward Networks credentials for a workspace
(POST fallback).

put.summary: PutWorkspaceForwardConfig stores Forward Networks credentials for a workspace.

get.summary:
GetWorkspaceForwardCollectors lists available Forward collectors for the
workspace.

post.summary: CreateWorkspaceForwardCollector creates a Forward collector for the workspace.

get.description: Templates are expected to live under a repo directory (default: blueprints/labpp) where each template is a subdirectory (e.g. blueprints/labpp/junos-example/...).
get.summary: GetWorkspaceLabppTemplates lists LabPP templates for a workspace.
GetWorkspaceNetlab returns the workspace's netlab server selection.

put.summary: UpdateWorkspaceNetlab updates the workspace's netlab server selection.

get.summary: GetWorkspaceNetlabTemplates lists Netlab templates for a workspace.

post.summary: RunWorkspaceAnsible triggers an ansible run for a workspace.
RunWorkspaceContainerlab triggers a Containerlab run for a workspace.

action.title: e2e, upload, start, stop, delete, configure

post.summary: RunWorkspaceLabpp triggers a LabPP run for a workspace.

action.title: up, create, restart, collect, status, down, clab-tarball

cleanup.title: for down/restart, remove workdir when true

post.summary: RunWorkspaceNetlab triggers a netlab run for a workspace.
RunWorkspaceTerraformApply triggers a terraform apply run for a workspace.
RunWorkspaceTerraformPlan triggers a terraform plan run for a workspace.
SyncWorkspace syncs resources for a single workspace.

get.summary:
GetWorkspaceTerraformTemplates lists Terraform template directories for a
workspace.
ListWorkspaceVariableGroups lists variable groups for a workspace.

post.summary: CreateWorkspaceVariableGroup creates a variable group for a workspace.

delete.summary: DeleteWorkspaceVariableGroup deletes a variable group for a workspace.

put.summary: UpdateWorkspaceVariableGroup updates a variable group for a workspace.

post.summary: SyncWorkspaceBlueprint syncs a workspace's blueprint catalog into the repo.

get.description: and redirects to the API testing UI.
get.summary: YaadeSSO performs a one-time login against Yaade using the shared admin account
PlatformHealth serves the platform health payload.
CheckAll performs a comprehensive health check of all system components.
Check is a simple health check helper that verifies the application is running.

post.summary: WebhookIngestAny receives webhook events via tokenized URLs.

post.description: This is used to build a lightweight "live node metrics" view without deploying a full monitoring stack. Data is stored as a short-lived snapshot in Redis.
post.summary:
IngestNodeMetric accepts host/node metrics from in-cluster collectors
(Telegraf).

post.description: Expected payload is Telegraf JSON serializer output for \`inputs.snmp\_trap\`.
post.summary: IngestSNMPTrap accepts SNMP trap events from in-cluster collectors (Telegraf).

post.description: This endpoint is intentionally unauthenticated (SSO) and guarded by an internal token header.
post.summary:
IngestSyslog accepts syslog events from in-cluster collectors (Vector/Fluent
Bit/etc).

get.summary: LabsRedirect resolves the configured labs UI redirect.
LabsRedirectAny handles subpaths under /labs.

post.summary: CreateNotification creates a new notification.

get.summary: GetUserNotifications retrieves notifications for a specific user.

put.summary: MarkAllNotificationsAsRead marks all notifications for a user as read.
MarkNotificationAsRead marks a notification as read.

get.description: This is designed for an unauthenticated landing page and must not leak user/workspace identifiers.
get.summary: StatusSummary returns a public, safe platform status summary.

post.summary: Delete removes an object from the bucket.

get.summary: List returns all objects in the bucket.

post.summary: List returns all objects in the bucket.
Read retrieves data from the bucket.
Write stores data in the bucket.

delete.summary: DeleteFile deletes a file from storage.

get.summary: ReadFile downloads a file from storage.

post.summary: WriteFile uploads a file to storage.

get.summary: SwaggerOpenAPI serves the OpenAPI schema.
GetNotificationSettings retrieves notification settings (admin only).

GetPublicNotificationSettings retrieves notification settings for authenticated
users.

get.description: Skyforge uses username-based identities, so \`id\` is the username.
get.summary: ListAssignableUsers lists users that can be shared on workspaces.
SearchUsers searches LDAP for users matching q.
Version reports the running server version info.
